page.title: 06LANDSCAPE AROUND ALVA
page.content: The{Ochil Hills}around Alva can be seen for miles. From east to west the hills are:Craigleith,Torry,Nebit,and the hills above Tillicoultry-Wood Hill and Elistoun Hill. Craigleith is rockiest and Wood Hill is most forested. It is also highest at 525m. Torry and Nebit are on either side of the{Alva Glen.}Wood Hill and Elistoun are on either side of the Mill Glen. The Silver Glen is on the other side of Wood Hill,next to Nebit. It gets its name because of the old {silver mines}there. The hills are a very interesting place to go for {recreation.}They are dangerous,though because the weather can change quickly.
